# Yellow Messenger hosted ngrok

install this package by entering following command

```
npm install @ym/ngrok --save
```

## Example

```
const ngrok = require("@ym/ngrok");
const url = ngrok
  .connect({
    subdomain: "example",
    port: 8080
  })
  .then(data => {
    console.log("url: ", data);
  })
  .catch(err => {
    console.log(err);
  });
```
